programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 48
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Melissa Mackay brings you today's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and round the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - Summer: Aussie Stunners \u0026 Designer Meadows
programme.desc: Tammy tours a designer garden, Costa visits a school farm, Jerry controls monster plants, Millie shares garden lessons, Josh explores unique natives, Clarence profiles lilly pillies, and Sophie admires garden glass artworks.

programme.title: The First Inventors - Design to Survive
programme.desc: Could you survive in Australia 65,000 years ago? From engineering volcanic landscapes into fish farms to mastering deadly fire, the unique survival inventions that let First Nations people thrive.

programme.title: Larapinta - Episode 6
programme.desc: Talia nears the end of her journey at Kati Thanda (Lake Eyre), and reflects on what she has learnt. Above all, Talia questions what role she has in creating a better future for the Larapinta River for all Australians. (Final).

programme.title: Living With Fire - Fire Power
programme.desc: Although Australia is shaped by fire and flood, bushfires are a man-made phenomenon. Historian and author Bill Gammage explains Australia could better deal with fire risks by understanding how Aboriginal people used it.

programme.title: Ms Represented with Annabel Crabb - Getting There
programme.desc: One hundred years after Australia elected its very first female parliamentarian, Annabel Crabb presents Ms Represented, a raw and honest account of politics from the female perspective.

programme.title: Ms Represented with Annabel Crabb - Being There
programme.desc: How does the everyday experience and public perception of women in politics differ from that of males? Why do women's personal lives matter more? Our interviewees reflect on the complexities of being a female pollie.

programme.title: Ms Represented with Annabel Crabb - In The Room
programme.desc: We track the arrival of a new wave of women into Australia's Parliament in the 1970s and 80s. Annabel examines the impact women have in politics and more broadly on society, by pushing through ground-breaking legislation.

programme.title: Ms Represented with Annabel Crabb - The Numbers Game
programme.desc: Annabel looks at the political parties from the mid-90s to now, and what happened when - more than a century after women won the right to run for Parliament in Australia - we finally got a female Prime Minister. (Final).

programme.title: Hot Copy on Headstart with Karen Davila
Hot Copy on Headstart with Karen Davila
Strategy Of Life (S1)
programme.desc: The way animals mate is fascinating. The antechinus, an indigenous Australian marsupial, risks everything during a one-week period of mating, and eventually dies bravely.

programme.title: Mysterious Creatures With Forrest Galante (S1)
programme.desc: Forrest travels to the Pacific Northwest with zoologist and wife Jessica on a mission to uncover the truth about the centuries-old myth of the lake monster.

programme.title: Nostalgia
programme.desc: Nostalgia aims to represent Chinese traditional culture by revealing life in villages in the way of story-telling. In this show, the audience can enjoy the natural and cultural backgrounds of Chinese traditional villages, and will find their knowledge of this oriental country expand through the interviews of Chinese people overseas whose memory and nostalgia can also reveal the very core value of the Chinese traditional culture.

programme.title: Across the Strait
programme.desc: The Across the Strait traces the much-discussed issues across the Strait, reflects the will of the citizens on two sides of the Strait and details the Chinese Government’s policy of “one country, two systems” in a bid to enhance the Taiwan fellowmen’s understanding of the Mainland China.

programme.title: \t Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Yi realizes that Peng and Everest were taken by Nian, the legendary dragon-like creature associated with Chinese New Year – and he’s also taken their other creature friends! With Burnish and Duchess’ help, Yi and Jin travel outside of the city to find Nian’s cave. But a skirmish in the cave drives the conflict with Nian back to the city, wreacking havoc on the festival. The crew and creatures band together to try to stop Nian, but they’re no match. Will Yi be able to create magic and connect with the troubled creature without Everest’s magic strings on her violin?

programme.desc: Boss Baby struggles to take a sick day even though a mysterious baby cry is wreaking havoc on the neighborhood baby-love.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Mega Fat CEO Baby holds a game day at Baby Corp and Boss Baby must find a way to beat Mega Fat CEO Baby at his own game.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: When baby families are leaving town, Boss Baby and Tim battle to prove Bootsy is behind it all.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss Baby uses the cover of Halloween Night to sneak into Bubeezee’s Headquarters to shut it all down. Tim covers for Boss by distracting Marisol with a night of trick or treating.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Finally promoted to CEO, Boss Baby sets his sights on achieving 100% Baby Love, while dealing with the annoying Puppies and Preeks who rented Baby Corp office space while Boss was gone. Tim and Danny become local heroes after saving a baby's life.

programme.title: \t Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Following the events of the feature, Yi struggles to recreate her violin magic without Everest. While her mom and NaiNai prepare for the grand opening of their family dumpling shop, Yi, Jin, and Peng discover that Yi’s violin has attracted a magical bird-like creature, Fenghuang, who needs their help. Yi’s music also calls on Everest, who returns to join the crew and find Fenghuang a suitable home.

programme.title: \t Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yi’s magic works, they notice that Everest isn’t looking too hot. In fact, he’s too hot. The crew tries everything to cool him down, even begging their old foe, Burnish, for help. Out of options, Yi tries to use her magic to send Everest home – until Burnish and his jerboa sidekick, Duchess, reveal that they’ve made over the kids’ rooftop fort into a high-tech HQ, complete with various tech gadgets for the crew and a temperature-controlled chamber for Everest.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk
programme.desc: Hiccup is given the responsibility to integrate dragons into the village of Berk and must contend with his rowdy friends, unruly dragons and an upset village elder.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk
programme.desc: Now that dragon-killing is no longer necessary, Hiccup tries to find a new job for Gobber the Blacksmith, but the task proves harder than expected.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk
programme.desc: As an approaching storm threatens Berk, Hiccup must work fast to make peace between the food-providing farm animals and the dragons.

programme.title: \t Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Morty’s babies still in her building. She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but it’s too much and she accidentally “loses” Mini-Morty. She’s going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk
programme.desc: Alvin and the outcast Vikings terrorize Berk, left defenseless without their dragons, and now only Hiccup can bring them back.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3
programme.desc: During one last stop by a toy store before Ben, Gwen, and Grandpa Max's maiden voyage across the Atlantic, Ben runs into an old bully, Kevin 11, who now has new powers - able to transform into aliens just like Ben, such as the 'bootleg' doppelgänger of Cannonbolt-- Wreckingbolt!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3
programme.desc: Team Tennyson goes international in the Omni-Copter and the first stop is for a hike in the Scottish Highlands, but the weather isn't just bad, it's foggy, and that means one thing and one thing only: the return of The Fogg!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3
programme.desc: Back stateside, Ben can't get into a cat cosplay competition, Top Tail, without a costume of his own, but when he goes Rath - a new cat-like alien with an attitude - Ben's newfound wild side quickly becomes much more than he bargained for.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3
programme.desc: Ben, Gwen, and Grandpa Max next travel to Castle Bishopbrook to visit a distant relative who's royalty, but when Ben encounters a 'ghost' at the haunted home, it turns out to actually be his new rival, Kevin 11, throwing even more twisted aliens his way: Thornblade, Undertow, and Dark Matter!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3
programme.desc: While in Paris, France, Ben catches Zombozo robbing the Louvre, but when Zombozo hypnotizes Ben to remain speechless, Ben must navigate a foreign land like a mime in order to stop the criminal clown and his travelling circus.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3
programme.desc: A trip to the South Pole goes upside down when Team Tennyson lands on the North Pole instead, but Ben quickly discovers the culprits: Solar \u0026 Polar Twain, magnetically-powered scientists who want to hold the world ransom by threatening to reverse Earth's magnetic poles!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3
programme.desc: Ben, Gwen, and Grandpa Max arrive at a Native American national park to witness the Ayasha Plinths - an ancient Stonehenge-like rock formation - but when the sinister sorcerer Hex arrives, Ben must battle against a beast Hex magically made out of huge rocks!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3
programme.desc: Team Tennyson checks out a Samurai Museum in Tokyo, where Ben is too impatient to wait out the Calligraphy experience for the more exciting-sounding Samurai one, but when a dangerous Samurai sword is stolen from the exhibit, Ben must take on its thief - the new Big Bad in town, the Forever Knight.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3
programme.desc: During a tour of the Japanese Robotics Museum, Ben finds hero-gone-wrong Tim Buktu 'trying to save' Tokyo from a Dragon, but has Tim finally turned over a new leaf, or is this just another one of his half-baked plans to play the part of hero?

programme.title: Ben 10 S3
programme.desc: During medieval times, Team Tennyson must fight to remember that they're not in the past at all, but actually at a Renaissance-esque faire- where 'King Zombozo' has hypnotized its guests into thinking they live in the past!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3
programme.desc: After an overpass collapses on the highway, Team Tennyson is in a traffic jam along with Simon Sez and family, but when Ben and Simon team up to tackle the gridlock together, Simon only makes matters much, much worse.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3
programme.desc: At Biggie Box Japan, Ben waits in an epic line for the release of the latest Sumo Slammers video game, Cyber Slammers, but Ben must soon save the store- not from game-hungry customers, but from Steam Smythe, who wants to retro-fit a massive mech with steam punk powers!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3
programme.desc: When Ben and family go to London to visit the legendary Big Ben, the Bugg Brothers are there to greet them - with yet another outrageously over-the-top plan of course: to shrink the Big Ben bell in order to steal it!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3
programme.desc: After traveling to Tampa Beach, Florida, Team Tennyson hope to get some much-needed rest \u0026 relaxation, but the tempests without a temper, the Weatherheads, have other plans that Ben must thwart: to build a new beach base!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3
programme.desc: While visiting China, Ben, Gwen, and Grandpa Max take a trek to the Great Wall, but their adventure is nearly ruined by daredevils LaGrange and Vin Ethanol trying to jump the international monument, and Ben must hop into the Rustbuggy to chase away the fast and furious foes.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3
programme.desc: During a family cookout at a forest campsite, Charmcaster users her magic to switch places with Gwen, but when Ben catches 'Charmcaster' sneaking about, he attacks- unaware it's actually his cursed cousin!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3
programme.desc: In Aspen, Colorado, Ben, Gwen, and Grandpa Max are on a hike to find the Forgeti, but when they realize they've stumbled upon Billy Billions own 'Winter in July' ski resort, Ben must battle Billy-with an assist from the Forgeti itself.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3
programme.desc: Ben hops into the Rustbuggy for a driving lesson along the sand dunes of Cape Cod, but he takes a freaky switchback turn when the Rustbuggy is mutated into a motor-monster by Bootleg - another alien transformation of Kevin 11, with powers similar to Upgrade!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3
programme.desc: Team Tennyson travel to the Chrysalen Institute for some hot yoga and good vibes, only to find that the Bugg Brothers are on vacation, too- but are the sneaky insectoids really on holiday, or just cooking up yet another silly, yet high stakes scheme?

programme.title: Ben 10 S3

programme.title: Ben 10 S3

programme.desc: So Hee married the perfect man but while she looks into the secret of his everlasting stamina, she finds out she's about to be killed by him and joins powers with her friends in order to kill him first.

programme.title: In The Line Of Duty 4
programme.desc: A Hong Kong cop and two American cops are onto a suspected harbor worker and are forced to team up when they discover that the suspect is a witness on the run from the CIA.

programme.title: Boyka: Undisputed 4
programme.desc: An underground fighter fights brutal matches to protect the widow of a man he unintentionally killed in the ring.

programme.title: Who Am I
programme.desc: Having fallen into amnesia 'he' is forced to fight for his life while searching for answers.

programme.title: Selfie From Hell
programme.desc: After her cousin comes to visit and falls ill, a woman starts to receive strange cell phone messages.

programme.title: Skiptrace
programme.desc: A detective from Hong Kong teams up with an American gambler to battle against a notorious Chinese criminal.

programme.title: Hitman's Wife's Bodyguard
programme.desc: The bodyguard, Michael Bryce, continues his friendship with assassin, Darius Kincaid, as they try to save Darius' wife Sonia.

programme.title: The Nice Guys
programme.desc: In 1970s Los Angeles, a mismatched pair of private eyes investigate a missing girl and the mysterious death of a porn star.

programme.title: Project A 2
programme.desc: Sergeant Dragon Ma discovers that his entire unit, except for Shi King, accepts bribes. Dragon is forced to confront Tiger Ow with only Shi King and three of his friends from the Marine Police.

programme.title: Steel Rain 2: Summit
programme.desc: A general holds the U.S. president and the leaders of North Korea and South Korea hostage on a submarine.

programme.title: Game Of Death
programme.desc: A martial arts movie star must fake his death to find the people who are trying to kill him.

programme.title: Dosukoi Love
programme.desc: Overweight, Ayane Sukehira went to Italy for chocolates. After an accident, found herself totally changed. She went back to Japan and begins to work as an esthetician.

programme.title: Beasts Clawing At Straws
programme.desc: Driven by their own desperate desires, the destinies of 8 down-on-their-luck individuals slowly converge and come crashing down while chasing after a mysterious money bag.

programme.title: Miss Baek
programme.desc: A woman finds it difficult to shake off her ex-convict label, until she meets a girl whom she is determined to save.

programme.title: The Fatal Encounter
programme.desc: King Jeongjo, known as “The King of Misfortune”, fights to survive an assassination attempt with the help of his loyal servant, who has a secret connection to the assassin.

programme.title: Honest Candidate 2
programme.desc: Joo Sang-sook, who failed to win the Seoul mayoral election by dropping the truth bomb on national television, is suddenly pulled into the spotlight again after rescuing a young man from drowning.

programme.title: Sori: Voice From The Heart
programme.desc: A father searching for his missing daughter finds a satellite that remembers sounds from across the world. Using his daughter's voice as a beacon, the satellite helps him track her down.

programme.title: We Are Brothers
programme.desc: Two brothers separated at birth reunite 30 years later and go on a road trip in search of their mom with Alzheimer's.

programme.title: Parasite
programme.desc: An unstoppable string of mishaps awaits when greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

programme.title: Concrete Utopia
programme.desc: Seoul has laid in ruin after an earthquake, leaving one single apartment remains standing. The apartment's resident representative strives to protect residents from outsiders...

programme.title: Welcome To Waikiki 2 Ep11
programme.desc: Actor Lee Joon-ki ropes two longtime friends into investing in the Seoul guesthouse he runs on the side, where their old crush from school comes to stay.

programme.title: Welcome To Waikiki 2 Ep12
programme.desc: Actor Lee Joon-ki ropes two longtime friends into investing in the Seoul guesthouse he runs on the side, where their old crush from school comes to stay.

programme.title: Forbidden Dream
programme.desc: Two Korean inventors develop a 20-year relationship while advancing the field of astronomy.

programme.title: Unforgettable
programme.desc: A radio DJ receives a letter written 23 years ago. Through the letter, the story of his first love and friendships of five friends are revealed.

programme.title: Possessed
programme.desc: Hee-jin returns home from college to find her missing sister. During the investigation, she hears that her sister had been possessed and her neighbors who knew her sister begin dying one by one….

programme.title: Lucky Chan-Sil
programme.desc: When a film producer suddenly loses her job, she moves into a bargain room in a rundown neighborhood where she meets an assortment of characters that inspire her in different ways.

programme.title: Code Name: Jackal
programme.desc: Minjung, a clumsy hitman, is hired to kill K-pop star Hyun, who is staying in a hotel where the police are conducting a stakeout for a serial killer.

programme.title: The Lost Choices
programme.desc: A young woman who has speech disorder is raped while on her way home. The police do not believe in her. She is frustrated and thus triggers her silent revenge against the world.

programme.title: The Glorious My Revenge
programme.desc: Detective Ryu lost his beloved son in a hit-and-run accident. As the statute of limitations passed without finding the criminal, he ran into the murderer of his son.

programme.title: Noryang: Deadly Sea
programme.desc: In the last battle of Yi Sun-Sin in 1598, he fought against the Japanese army and intertwined with the Ming dynasty, bringing the 7-year Japanese invasions of Korea to an end...

programme.title: The Odd Family: Zombie On Sale
programme.desc: When a pharmaceutical company's illegal experiments inadvertently create a zombie, the quirky Park family discovers an interesting side effect to the virus and tries to profit from it.

programme.title: Handsome Guys
programme.desc: Self-proclaimed tough guy Jae-Pil and sexy guy Sang-Gu move to a countryside home. A spirit sealed in the basement awakens, leading to a high-stimulus chilling comedy they'll never forget.

programme.title: The King
programme.desc: Believing power is paramount, Tae-soo aspires to become a prosecutor. As he achieves his goal and rises swiftly to power, he also sees the cruelty of a life at the top hierarchy in 90's Korea.

programme.title: The Witch: Part 2 The Other One
programme.desc: A mysterious girl survived a blood raid in a secret lab found herself being tracked down by a group of assassins.

programme.title: Where Would You Like To Go?
programme.desc: A tragic accident claims the lives of a teacher. His widow seeks solace in a trip to Warsaw, where an unexpected reunion and a letter bring hope to her journey of healing and rediscovery.

programme.title: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: Based on the true story of a disgraced Korean researcher who claims to have successfully cloned human embryo stem cells. However, the results were revealed to be fabricated along with other unethical practices later.

programme.title: Cart
programme.desc: As a social critique, ‘Cart’ tells a story of the employees of a retail supermarket band together when the contract workers are summarily laid off.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: A mermaid from the Joseon period ends up in present-day Seoul, where she crosses paths with a swindler who may have ties to someone from her past.

programme.title: My Dearest Nemesis
programme.desc: Adapted from the popular webtoon of the same title, as Su-jeong met her newly appointed manager, she realised he was the guy she had met 16 years ago in an online game and had fallen in love with.

Us Squawk On The Street
programme.desc: Headquartered live on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) where the biggest companies in the world trade, “Squawk On The Street” tracks the action of every stock and gives you access to the treasury, currency and commodity action in real time. The show also covers the final hour of European trading, providing investors with actionable insight on the best course of action to take in U.S. based markets.

programme.title: Us Money Movers
programme.desc: “Money Movers” provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. “Money Movers” anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: \"Halftime Report\" is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBC’s “The Exchange” is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, “Power Lunch” delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, “Closing Bell” guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. “Closing Bell: Overtime” takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Us Fast Money
programme.desc: “Fast Money” is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, “Fast Money” breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: Managing Asia
programme.desc: CNBC’s Christine Tan has been talking to the people who are shaping, governing and leading the Asia Pacific region for over twenty years in this ground-breaking show.

programme.title: Cnbc Meets
programme.desc: Tania Bryer gets 'up close and personal' with some of the world's most inspirational leaders from Business, Politics, Sport, and The Arts.

programme.title: Unlocked
programme.desc: CNBC's Unlocked takes an inside look at how much people spend on housing, what they get for their money and what they've had to sacrifice to turn their real estate dreams into reality.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell

programme.title: Channel Japan 2024
programme.desc: \"Channel Japan\" offers a fresh look at the latest in the economy, business, technology, culture and sightseeing of Japan. Presenters Makiko Utsuda, Maki Arai and Priyanka Yoshikawa guide viewers on a tour of cutting-edge products and services, key persons and companies, the hottest tourist destinations, and a variety of other topics that provide unique insights on Japanese lifestyles and views, and shed light on the vast business opportunities that Japan offers to international investors and entrepreneurs.

programme.title: American Greed S1-15
programme.desc: “American Greed” goes inside the dark side of the American Dream - where money seduces, power corrupts, and smooth criminals will stop at nothing to get rich. Their complex scams leave victim's lives in shambles. Each episode is a deep dive into the minds and actions of heartless crooks who live lives most people can only dream of. But how many luxury homes and exotic cars does it take to justify these white collar crimes? Ultimately for the crooks the dream turns into a nightmare when their shady plans unravel. “American Greed” follows the money through the eyes of the criminals, the victims, and the investigators who bring these scammers to justice.

programme.desc: When the trees start losing their leaves, Phoebe begins knitting the trees in the park sweaters, but when the neighborhood kids see the sweaters they think they're a mysterious \"Yarn Fairy,\" and they want to see her in action, making it much harder for the Dews to put more sweaters on the latest trees that have lost their leaves. / When Marcus and Harper team-up for a school project, they decide to bake something (\"It's like inventing, but with food!\"), only to come across multiple baking misshaps (and happy accidents) along the way that the Dew Drops must secretly assist them with.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants

programme.title: \t Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: It’s Chinese New Year! With Yi and Jin tied up in their respective CNY festival performances, Peng and a semi-disguised Everest hit the festive streets, eating and enjoying everything in sight. Meanwhile, while paying respects to her late father at a temple, Yi panics when an accident breaks her magical violin strings. She hurries back to find her friends, only to spot Peng and Everest and watch them get snatched up by a menacing, mysterious creature!

programme.title: \t Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Yi realizes that Peng and Everest were taken by Nian, the legendary dragon-like creature associated with Chinese New Year – and he’s also taken their other creature friends! With Burnish and Duchess’ help, Yi and Jin travel outside of the city to find Nian’s cave. But a skirmish in the cave drives the conflict with Nian back to the city, wreacking havoc on the festival. The crew and creatures band together to try to stop Nian, but they’re no match. Will Yi be able to create magic and connect with the troubled creature without Everest’s magic strings on her violin?

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman
programme.desc: An epic historic adventure set during the turbulent times of the Three Kingdoms. Cao Cao attempts to enlist Guan Yu into his forces, but Guan is loyal to his sworn brother Liu Bei, who is also Cao’s enemy. As Guan tries to rescue Liu Bei’s concubine from Cao, he is forced to fight his way through. Can he succeed in the end?

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Blind War
programme.desc: Former SWAT captain Dong Gu suffers traumatic visual loss during a failed mission for which he is forced to take responsibility. He manages to get over and adapt to the situation with his daughter’s company, until his nemesis appears and puts his daughter in danger. Despite being blind, Dong Gu must fight to save his daughter.

programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! Join Filipino actor, model and swimmer Enchong Dee and his celebrity friend Ria, to explore the highs and lows of Hong Kong. They are eager to push their boundaries in this thrilling new adventure.

programme.title: Kungfu Stuntmen
programme.desc: Hong Kong action cinema is famous for its real kung fu moves performed by a group called “Kung Fu Stuntmen”. This docu-film pays tribute to the generations of kung fu stuntmen, with the crew spending over two years digging archives and interviewing many talents, including the most prominent masters like Jackie Chan, Donnie Yen and Sammo Hung.

programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, police officer Zhang relentlessly hunts them down and accidentally finds himself implicated in a major child abduction case. In the process, he teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the international crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: Enter the Girl Dragon
programme.desc: A big fan of Bruce Lee, Pooja practises jeet kune do to become a skilled martial artist. She is so obsessed with Bruce Lee’s wisdom and martial arts technique that she loves him more than her boyfriend, Neel. However, when Neel is kidnapped by the mafia, she must fight them to save him.

programme.title: The Comeback
programme.desc: Uncle Hua is a retired agent who owns an antique shop on an old street. When the old street is forcibly demolished by the local Green Dragon Gang one day, Uncle Hua’s hidden identity is accidentally revealed, and he is pursued by a mysterious organization headed by Ah Jie. A fatal duel has just begun!

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3

programme.desc: Frank is framed for murder after his girlfriend is killed in a tragic incident during their visit to the Middle East. He is sent to a prison where he meets a Muslim inmate who helps him plan for a prison escape to prove his innocence. When his friend suddenly dies, can Frank successfully escape and seek justice for himself?

programme.title: Grade 4 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapaliwanag ang iba't ibang uri ng pangungusap at ang paggamit ng balangkas sa pagpapakita ng nakalap na impormasyon. Matutuhan din dito kung paano magpahayag ng sariling opinyon o reaksyon.

programme.title: Grade 4 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the concept of area and volume of triangles, parallelograms and trapezoids. These episodes also teach about bar graphs and simple experiments.

programme.title: Grade 4 English
programme.desc: These episodes are about writing short stories and journals. These episodes also talk about different sources of information.

programme.title: Grade 4 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan natin ang pang-unawa at pagpapahalaga sa kaniyang mga karapatan at tungkulin bilang mamamayang Filipino.

programme.title: Grade 4 Science
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the different types of soil, the different sources of water suitable for human consumption, components of weather using simple instruments, and the Sun as the main source of heat and light on Earth.

programme.title: Grade 6 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagpapahayag at pagsusulat ng sariling opinyon o reaksyon, pagsusuri ng tekstong binasa o napanood, at paggawa ng dayagram.

programme.title: Grade 6 Math
programme.desc: These episodes are about volume of solid figures, meter reading, pie graphs and experimental probability.

programme.title: Grade 6 English
programme.desc: These episodes are about composing clear and coherent sentences and writing a persuasive essay.

programme.title: Grade 6 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa pag-unawa at pagpapahalaga sa patuloy na pagpupunyagi ng mga Filipino tungo sa pagtugon sa mga hamon ng nagsasarili at umuunlad na bansa.

programme.title: Grade 6 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain the effects of earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, the weather patterns and seasons in the Philippines, the Earth’s rotation and revolution, and characteristics of planets in the solar system.

programme.title: Grade 8 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito susuriin ang iba't ibang akda ayon sa mga elemento nito. Tatalakayin din dito ang pagpapahayag ng pansariling paniniwala at malikhaing pagsusulat.

programme.title: Grade 8 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of inequalities in a triangle, and parallel and perpendicular lines. These episodes also teach about the key concepts of probability.

programme.title: Grade 8 English
programme.desc: These episodes talk about the different sources of information and grammatical signals. These also talk about communicating skills and writing paragraphs.

programme.title: Grade 8 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa kahalagahan ng pakikipag- ugnayan at sama-samang pagkilos sa kontemporanyong daigdig tungo sa pandaigdigang kapayapaan, pagkakaisa, pagtutulungan, at kaunlaran.

programme.title: Grade 8 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about the digestive system and its interaction with other body systems, the diseases that result from nutrient deficiency and ingestion of harmful substances. These episodes also talk about how cells divide to produce new cells, meiosis, the concept of species, and the one-way flow of energy and the cycling of materials in an ecosystem.

programme.title: Grade 10 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa iba't ibang akda at maikling kuwento na may kinalaman sa kulturang Asyano. Susuriin din dito ang mga tauhan, mahahalagang pangyayari, at kaisipan sa binasang akda.

programme.title: Grade 10 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of measures of position.

programme.title: Grade 10 English
programme.desc: These episodes focus on writing research reports, giving definitions, and observing correct grammar.

programme.title: Grade 10 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa kahalagahan ng pagkamamamayan at pakikilahok sa mga gawaing pansibiko tungo sa pagkakaroon ng pamayanan at bansang maunlad, mapayapa, at may pagkakaisa.

programme.title: Grade 10 Science
programme.desc: These episodes teach about how gases behave based on the motion and relative distances between gas particles, the structure of biomolecules. These episodes also explain the chemical reactions associated with biological and industrial processes affecting life and the environment.

programme.title: Extracurricular
programme.desc: These episodes feature different short animations and documentaries that are related to arts and culture.

programme.title: Alternative Learning System
programme.desc: These episodes focus on the process of plaing, setting up, and ruing a small business. These episodes also talk about entrepreneurial skills.

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the characteristics and needs of animals and plants and how they grow and the physical properties and movement of objects. These also talk about the different types of weather and changes that occur in the environment, the concepts of size, length, weight, time, and money, and the sense of quantity and numeral relations.

programme.title: Grade 1 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri ng mga pabula, tugma, tula, balita, at kuwento. Pinakikita rin dito ang tamang paggamit ng malalaki at maliliit na titik, mga pangngalan, at tamang pagbasa ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: These episodes discuss time and non-standard units of length, mass and capacity. These episodes also talk about pictographs without scales and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 1 English
programme.desc: These episodes talk about action words and describing words. These episodes also teach about sorting and classifying words and following directions.

programme.title: Grade 1 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapaliwanag ang konsepto ng distansya sa paglalarawan ng sariling kapaligirang ginagalawan tulad ng tahanan at paaralan at ng kahalagahan ng pagpapanatili at pangangalaga nito.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan natin ang tungkol sa pagpapantig, pagbibigay ng kahulugan sa mga salita, pagbuo ng mga pangungusap, at pagbabasa ng teksto. Tinatalakay din dito ang mga pang-ukol, pang-abay, at salitang kilos.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about time, standard measures of length, mass and capacity and area using square-tile units. These also deepen the understanding about pictographs without and with scales.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about pronouns and prepositions. These episodes also show how to read, match, and write words that use short vowels.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Palipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tatalakayin ang pagpapahalaga sa kagalingang pansibiko bilang pakikibahagi sa mga layunin ng sariling komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tinatalakay ang tungkol sa mga pangngalan, panghalip, at iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento. Ipapaliwanag din dito ang pagsusulat ng mga kuwento at pagbibigay ng kahulugan ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach about conversion of time, linear, mass and capacity measures and area of square and rectangle. These episodes also talk about bar graphs and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: These epsiodes are about adjectives, adverbs, maps and graphs. These episodes also show how to read words and restate facts from texts.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa gawaing pangkabuhayan at bahaging ginagampanan ng pamahalaan at ang mga kasapi nito, mga pinuno at iba pang naglilingkod tungo sa pagkakaisa, kaayusan at kaunlaran ng mga lalawigan sa kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about people, animals, plants, landforms and bodies of water, and their importance. These also talk about the types and effects of weather as they relate to daily activities, health and safety, and the natural objects in the sky affect one’s daily activities.

programme.title: Grade 5 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagbibigay ng mga mahalagang pangyayari, paksa, at opinyon tungkol sa napakinggan o nabasang teksto. Matutuhan din dito ang wastong pagbaybay sa mga salita at paglalarawan ng tagpuan at tauhan.

programme.title: Grade 5 Math
programme.desc: These episodes are about area, volume, and temperature. These episodes also explain line graphs and experimental probability.

programme.title: Grade 5 English
programme.desc: These episodes focus on analyzing visual and multimedia elements and writing paragraphs and articles.

programme.title: Grade 5 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ay pag-uusapan ang bahaging ginampanan ng kolonyalismong Espanyol at pandaigdigang koteksto ng reporma sa pag- usbong ng kamalayang pambansa patungo sa pagkabuo ng Pilipinas bilang isang nasyon.

programme.title: Grade 5 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain how weathering and soil erosion shape the Earth’s surface and affect living things and the environment. These episodes also discuss about weather disturbances and their effects, the phases of the Moon and the beliefs and practices, associated with it, and the constellations and the information derived from their location in the sky.

programme.title: Grade 7 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito susuriin ang iba't ibang mga akda ayon sa mga tauhan, kaisipan, at saloobin na nakapaloob dito. Tatalakayin din ang pagsusulat ng sariling pananaw at ideya tungkol sa napakinggan.

programme.title: Grade 7 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach the key concepts, uses, and importance of statistics, data collection/gathering and the different forms of data representation, measures of central tendency, measures of variability, and probability.

programme.title: Grade 7 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach writing and composing essays. These also feature Philippine literature and theater.

programme.title: Grade 7 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagtugon ng mga Asyano sa mga hamon ng pagbabago, pag-unlad at pagpapatuloy ng Silangan at Timog-Silangang Asya sa Transisyonal at Makabagong Panahon (ika-16 hanggang ika-20 Siglo).

programme.title: Grade 7 Science
programme.desc: These episodes talk about the relation of geographical location of the Philippines to its environment, the different phenomena that occur in the atmosphere, the relationship of the seasons and the position of the Sun in the sky, and the occurrence of eclipses.

programme.title: Grade 9 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri ng iba't ibang akda na may kaugnayan sa kulturang Asyano batay sa mga elemento nito. Ipapaliwanag din dito kung paano maglahad at maghambing ng mga pananaw.

programme.title: Grade 9 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about the basic concepts of trigonometry.

programme.title: Grade 9 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the relevance worth of ideas, soundness of author’s reasoning, and the effectiveness of a presentation. These also explain critical issues that demand sound analysis and call for prompt actions.

programme.title: Grade 9 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa mga sektor ng ekonomiya at mga patakarang pang- ekonomiya nito sa harap ng mga hamon at pwersa tungo sa pambansang pagsulong at pag-unlad.

programme.title: Grade 9 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain the projectile motion, impulse and momentum, and conservation of linear momentum, conservation of mechanical energy, the relationship among heat, work, and efficiency. These episodes also talk about generation, transmission, and distribution of electrical energy from power plants to home.

programme.title: Extracurricular
programme.desc: These episodes feature different short animations and documentaries that are related to arts and culture.

programme.title: Parent-Teacher Activity Time
programme.desc: These episodes are intented to help parents and teachers in teaching and guiding their children and students. These explain different topics that will help them be prepared for the distance learning set up.

programme.title: Alternative Learning System
programme.desc: These episodes focus on the process of plaing, setting up, and ruing a small business. These episodes also talk about entrepreneurial skills.

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the characteristics and needs of animals and plants and how they grow and the physical properties and movement of objects. These also talk about the different types of weather and changes that occur in the environment, the concepts of size, length, weight, time, and money, and the sense of quantity and numeral relations.

programme.title: Grade 1 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri ng mga pabula, tugma, tula, balita, at kuwento. Pinakikita rin dito ang tamang paggamit ng malalaki at maliliit na titik, mga pangngalan, at tamang pagbasa ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: These episodes discuss time and non-standard units of length, mass and capacity. These episodes also talk about pictographs without scales and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 1 English
programme.desc: These episodes talk about action words and describing words. These episodes also teach about sorting and classifying words and following directions.

programme.title: Grade 1 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapaliwanag ang konsepto ng distansya sa paglalarawan ng sariling kapaligirang ginagalawan tulad ng tahanan at paaralan at ng kahalagahan ng pagpapanatili at pangangalaga nito.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan natin ang tungkol sa pagpapantig, pagbibigay ng kahulugan sa mga salita, pagbuo ng mga pangungusap, at pagbabasa ng teksto. Tinatalakay din dito ang mga pang-ukol, pang-abay, at salitang kilos.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about time, standard measures of length, mass and capacity and area using square-tile units. These also deepen the understanding about pictographs without and with scales.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about pronouns and prepositions. These episodes also show how to read, match, and write words that use short vowels.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Palipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tatalakayin ang pagpapahalaga sa kagalingang pansibiko bilang pakikibahagi sa mga layunin ng sariling komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tinatalakay ang tungkol sa mga pangngalan, panghalip, at iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento. Ipapaliwanag din dito ang pagsusulat ng mga kuwento at pagbibigay ng kahulugan ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach about conversion of time, linear, mass and capacity measures and area of square and rectangle. These episodes also talk about bar graphs and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: These epsiodes are about adjectives, adverbs, maps and graphs. These episodes also show how to read words and restate facts from texts.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan

programme.title: Net25 World News with Alma Angeles
Simba Junior to the World Cup
Medical Frontiers
programme.desc: Muse cells, discovered by a Japanese researcher, are found in the human body and have the unique ability to repair tissues. We examine their potential in treating intractable diseases.

programme.title: Japanese Chefs' Wine Odyssey
programme.desc: Top Japanese chef Matsumoto Keisuke visits two Spanish wineries: one boosting their region with top-quality wine, the other preserving heritage grapes. He creates dishes to match each unique wine.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: NEWSLINE BIZ
programme.desc: Reporting the latest business, finance and economic news, with added analysis from studio guests.

programme.title: Evolving Dysphagia Diets
programme.desc: Many elderly Japanese have difficulty chewing or swallowing, and must follow soft, nutritional \"dysphagia diets.\" Kawabata Eri is teaching caregivers how to make appetizing dysphagia-friendly dishes.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: NEWSLINE BIZ
programme.desc: Reporting the latest business, finance and economic news, with added analysis from studio guests.

programme.title: Asia Insight
programme.desc: Following 15 years of strict censorship under the former administration, Bangladeshi journalists are now seeking the truth and freedom of press in order to regain the trust of the people.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: NEWSLINE BIZ
programme.desc: Reporting the latest business, finance and economic news, with added analysis from studio guests.

programme.title: BENTO EXPO
programme.desc: Bento connects the world! Discover a universe of bento from Japan and around the world, with step-by-step instructions and delicious tips and tricks!

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: Artisan Matoba Kensho restores traditional dolls. Beyond cleaning, he repairs damage to faces. Well-cared-for dolls can last 100 years, so he hopes people bring them to him, and never discard them.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Chatroom Japan
programme.desc: Xu Quanyi sees it as his mission to promote the charm of Fukushima. Sharing his stories is how he counters the stigma Fukushima continues to suffer following the 2011 disaster.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE: Summer Light Show
programme.desc: We venture to the outskirts of Edo just after sunset, where a group of women and children have come to a stream to enjoy a popular summer activity. What could they be looking for among the weeds?

programme.title: KAIZOKU: Noshima Island
programme.desc: The Murakami Kaizoku were seafarers and fighters in the Seto Inland Sea. We explore their history and legacy, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time, Noshima Island.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: Ueno is home to world-class cultural facilities, a bustling street market, a historic shrine, and much more. We look at some of the many features that make this diverse urban environment so popular.

programme.title: GRAND SUMO Preview
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN will air its Grand Sumo Preview for the tourney starting ( ). Our reporter visits the city to meet wrestlers and find out their secret of winning.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Kosovar Sexual Violence Survivors
programme.desc: Vasfije Krasniqi Goodman was the first woman to speak publicly about sexual violence during the Kosovo War. This documentary portrays the survivors' struggles and pursuit of justice 25 years later.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Running Across Recovering Sanriku
programme.desc: 13 years after the 2011 Great East Japan Earthquake and Tsunami, a stage race is held on the coast of Iwate, covering 130 km in 3 days. We follow the runners as they learn about the area's recovery.

programme.desc: A 400km ride through southern Nagano on a historic old highway and winding mountain roads to an area with a unique culture, including traditional wooden comb making, green tofu and rice straw craft.

programme.title: Ratratan
programme.desc: A peace-loving man is forced to live a life of violence when his daughter is kidnapped by a group of armed men. Unable to rely on law enforcers to go after the perpetrators, he decides to take matters into his own hand.

programme.title: Dahil May Isang Ikaw
programme.desc: Anya (Regine Velasquez) accidentally bumps Andrew's (Aga Muhlach) car while backing up. Both were arguing whose fault it was. Later Anya discovers that Andrew is her client and she apologizes. She offers to treat him out to dinner. This becomes the start of the proverbial beautiful friendship.

programme.title: Dibdiban Ang Laban
programme.desc: After earning her college degree, Marian (Anjanette Abayari) returns to her small, far-flung hometown to become a teacher for the poor. But one day, Marian is captured by rebels as a way to get back at her oppressive father.

programme.title: A.B. Normal College
programme.desc: Brace yourself as the hilarious guys of A.B. Normal College bring chaos and fun to their university! Andres (Andrew E.), Dominic (Ogie Alcasid) and Miguel (Mikey Arroyo), the school's most notorious students, are challenged when the school participates in a quiz show to upgrade the image of the school.

programme.title: Lastikman: Unang Banat
programme.desc: Disguised in his sharp green and black get-up he is Lastikman, a hip, young dude whose kind heart brings help to the oppressed, the defenseless or to anybody in danger.

programme.title: Your Place Or Mine?
programme.desc: A young woman (Andi Eigenmann) has a one night stand with a total stranger (Bret Jackson). Fate brought them together again. And that's where their whirlwind romance started.

programme.title: Babe, I Love You
programme.desc: Babe, I Love You circles on the story of two individuals who have never thought that love can blossom right at the middle of their two opposite worlds.

programme.title: Mapupulang Rosas
programme.desc: Mapupulang Rosas.

programme.title: Sabong
programme.desc: He’s a young man with a rather naive look on life. To transform him into a virile-type of guy, his rich father hires a beautiful and sensuous sabungera to teach him the ways of the world.

programme.title: Elemento
programme.desc: The story is about Cristine (Kara) and her struggle when her son Lucas (Albert Silos) returned from school field trip, with a different soul.

programme.title: Bukas na Lang Kita Mamahalin
programme.desc: Angelu de Leon and Diether Ocampo team up for the first time in this witty, heart-warming story that explores the ups and downs of romance in the 21st century.

programme.title: Kahit Ayaw Mo Na
programme.desc: It follows Joey who is a fashion designer, Mikee who is a vlogger and Ally who is an aspiring composer. What seemed to be an ordinary trip to Samar turned out to be more than they presume.

programme.title: The Exorsis
programme.desc: The film follows Gina, who must find an exorcist after her younger sister gets possessed by a dead woman's spirit.

programme.title: Meet Me in St. Gallen
programme.desc: An aspiring painter and a frustrated musician become instant friends but decided to end and leave everything as is just like complete strangers. What will happen if they meet again as two completely different people?

programme.title: More Than Blue
programme.desc: K (JC Santos) and Cream (Yassi Pressman) believe they're soulmates. When K finds out that he's dying, he thinks setting her free would be best for her.

programme.title: Amnesia Love
programme.desc: A gay guy meets an accident and gets washed up in a remote island. When he wakes up he doesn't remember anything, including his gender orientation. After developing a romance with a barrio lady, things get crazy when his boyfriend is able to locate him.

programme.title: Anong Ganap?
programme.desc: Being in on the entertainment circle is quick and easy on PBO's Anong Ganap? Presented by the gorgeous entertainment anchor ng bayan, Phoemela Baranda.

programme.title: May-December-January
programme.desc: A single mother tests her relationship with her teenage son when she starts an affair with his best friend, for whom her son also harbours feelings.

programme.title: Status: Single
programme.desc: Rufa’s character is anxious to get married after her boyfriend dumps her and all her girlfriends get married one after the other. At 30, Doris can feel her biological clock ticking.

programme.title: MIA
programme.desc: Mia Salazar (Coleen Garcia), a self-destructive, alcoholic doctor who joined the Doctor to the Barrios program to heal from the tragedy of her fiance's death meets the cheerful and nerdy forester Jay Policarpio (Edgar Allan Guzman). Together, the two will embark on a new journey.

programme.title: Hibla
programme.desc: Isabel and Clara are childhood friends from a small town who were separated when Clara's family moved to the city. As each of them seek their own idea of fulfillment, their motivations and actions will lead them to a tragic and inevitable end.

programme.title: Unfaithful Wife 2
programme.desc: Jennifer's (Patricia Javier) life looks perfect: she's beautiful, she's rich, and she has Jimmy (Ian Veneracion), a wonderful husband. But in spite of everything, there remains a wound inside her that refuses to heal.

programme.title: Darkroom
programme.desc: A group of teenage friends who seeks the thrill of ghost-hunting, and stumbles upon an old camera. As they carelessly play with it, they unknowingly summon the demon that exists inside.

programme.title: Pilak
programme.desc: Pilak.

programme.title: My Bakit List
programme.desc: Bombarded with so much why's in her life, Dess (Louise delos Reyes) embarks on a soul searching journey. Unknown to her, she is about to face the biggest why of her life when she accidentally bumps into her ex-boyfriend who left her without any explanation.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Kumander Bawang: Kalaban ng mga Aswang
programme.desc: Matang Bato is a small village which kept many dark mysteries in its past and they are starting to haunt them once again. Our unlikely hero, Tikboy was a frail teenager seeking to make his grandfather proud by joining in his Moro-Moro stage play. But little did he know there was more to his life than just being a stage actor. Suddenly monsters were appearing left and right, revived and controlled by their leader, Conde Regalado, they struck terror to the village. Acquiring the aid of old hermit, Tinyente Kulog, he learned about his past and how it will help save the villagers. Transformed into Kumander Bawang, armed with garlic bombs and superhuman strength, he ventured forth to end the battle that his father has started twenty years ago.

programme.title: Encounter ep 4

During his stay there, he crosses paths with Luna, an Architecture student from the University of Santo Tomas.

programme.title: Taddy Taddy Po ep 10
programme.desc: A Sari-Sari Original Series. In this modern family, love wins. Alex is an up-and-coming reporter in a relationship with Marcus, a chef. One day, Alex's sister's kids show up at the couple's doorstep and the couple has no choice but to take care of the kids.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Kumander Bawang: Kalaban ng mga Aswang
programme.desc: Matang Bato is a small village which kept many dark mysteries in its past and they are starting to haunt them once again. Our unlikely hero, Tikboy was a frail teenager seeking to make his grandfather proud by joining in his Moro-Moro stage play. But little did he know there was more to his life than just being a stage actor. Suddenly monsters were appearing left and right, revived and controlled by their leader, Conde Regalado, they struck terror to the village. Acquiring the aid of old hermit, Tinyente Kulog, he learned about his past and how it will help save the villagers. Transformed into Kumander Bawang, armed with garlic bombs and superhuman strength, he ventured forth to end the battle that his father has started twenty years ago.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S2 ep 9
programme.desc: Since the end of Season 1, Par Jack (Benjie Paras) has made his ghost whispering ability a full-time business and is now a popular Ghost Whisperer in the country. Still with the help of his sidekicks, Nik and Bur, they now conduct business at their new facility, Day Scare Center.

programme.title: The Rain in España ep 1
programme.desc: The Rain in España follows the story of Kalix, a student hailing from a family of doctors who decided to tread a different path and take up Legal Management at Ateneo de Manila University. programme.title: The Kasambahays S2 ep 3

programme.title: Kalye Kweens ep 11
programme.desc:
Mandy and Telly are former best friends who are now the leaders of 
neighboring communities that have been perennially in conflict. Their 
game of one-upmanship worsens when both their sons become best 
friends but are smitten with the same girl.

programme.title: Werewolf Game Inferno
programme.desc: Based on a famous Japanese comic, ten high school students are trapped and forced to participate in a deadly game. Once the game starts, they have to betray their friends and kill off each other in order to survive. Who will be the last person standing?

programme.title: Encroach
programme.desc: University freshman Zhen Xin finds her classmates, except You Mei, very unfriendly to her, and the two quickly became good friends. Zhen Xin lives in the dormitory and constantly hears strange noises. When she was attacked by a man in black, You Mei saved her and the latter’s identity is also revealed.

programme.title: Ten Minutes to Midnight
programme.desc: Amy gets bitten by a rabid bat during her last graveyard shift as a veteran punk rock disc jockey. When a storm traps Amy, her mysterious replacement and an anxious staff inside their small-town radio station, reality starts to distort as they go deeper into the graveyard shift….

programme.title: Nightmare of Darkness
programme.desc: A young actress’ Weibo account is refreshed with a new post three years after her death, disclosing her dating picture with young idol Wu Zi Zhen. Wu seeks help from the PR consultant Qiao Shen at his haunted house, but encounters a series of horrifying incidents. After being interrogated by Qiao, Wu lowers his guard and unveils a shocking secret….

programme.title: Jacqueline Comes Home: The Chiong Story
programme.desc: Based on a true crime that happened in 1997, the story is about an unknown assailant kidnapping two sisters, Jacqueline and Marijoy Chiong. This is one of the most shocking cases of rape and murder in Philippines history.

programme.title: Werewolf Game Inferno
programme.desc: Based on a famous Japanese comic, ten high school students are trapped and forced to participate in a deadly game. Once the game starts, they have to betray their friends and kill off each other in order to survive. Who will be the last person standing?

programme.title: Encroach
programme.desc: University freshman Zhen Xin finds her classmates, except You Mei, very unfriendly to her, and the two quickly became good friends. Zhen Xin lives in the dormitory and constantly hears strange noises. When she was attacked by a man in black, You Mei saved her and the latter’s identity is also revealed.

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after a masked killer brutally murdered all her friends, Camryn struggles to live a normal life as she tries to come to terms with the traumatic experience. Just when she thinks she might be ready to finally start anew, Camryn suspects that the killer has come back for her...

programme.title: Sa Haba Ng Gabi
programme.desc: Two housemaids and a driver take shelter at their employer's mansion when a zombie outbreak happens one night. Can they all survive the night?

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: The Hungry Ghost Festival is around the corner. A newcomer at a workplace offends the ghosts in his office building when he shows disrespect for the spirits on his first day at work. In the course of a night shift, the man and his colleagues working overtime experience spooky encounters that make them reflect on their behaviours and beliefs...

programme.title: Living Space
programme.desc: When a young couple discovers that their lodge is haunted by the ghost of a Nazi SS officer, their romantic holiday in Germany turns into a nightmare.

programme.title: Mae Nak Reborn
programme.desc: Mae Nak the ghost wife returns to take revenge for a pregnant woman who is sexually assaulted and loses her baby. No one can identify the assailant except Mae Nak, who turns into an evil spirit in order to punish the assailant for his evil deeds.

programme.title: The Case of Disappearances
programme.desc: In Misty Village, the adopted son Wen Jie is haunted by a recurring nightmare. He delves into a series of disappearance cases in the village to seek his true identity. As more villagers die mysteriously, belief in the curse of Emperor Jing Lung intensifies. Wen Jie teams up with the security chief to unveil the conspiracy and protect the villagers.

programme.title: Dead Dicks
programme.desc: Richie is a suicidal young man who finds himself very much alive every time he kills himself, although there will be a dead body of him in his apartment after each suicide attempt. Richie’s sister comes to his rescue and discovers the piled up dead bodies in the house. What keeps bringing Richie back?

programme.title: Night Watch
programme.desc: After a car accident erases his memory, Wang Ren Jie takes on a job as a night guard. As the clock strikes midnight, he reports for duty at the abandoned building, only to find three lost souls awaiting him, and unravels a revenge plot at the same time. Is this fate or a curse cast by vengeful spirits?

programme.title: Apartment 212
programme.desc: Jennifer moves into a new apartment after leaving her abusive husband. As she starts life anew, something keeps biting her when she sleeps, leading her to be sleep deprived, paranoid and paralyzed with fear of the unseen.

programme.title: Whisper of Silent Body
programme.desc: Renowned as the \"corpse whisperer,\" forensic pathologist Qin Ming uncovers vital clues from the corpses. During a homicide investigation, he unravels a murder case sixteen years ago in the snowy mountain with his assistant and a detective. Together, they unveil the secrets of the mysterious homicide.

programme.desc: Lonely widow Joyce rents out a room in her house and becomes dangerously obsessed with a younger guest. Desperate for love, she is willing to eliminate anyone hindering her pursuit of happiness, and a chilling tale of obsession unfolds.

programme.desc: In Switzerland, land of consensus and neutrality, previously unheard women's voices are being raised against structural racism and stereotypes. A context in which the Swiss-Congolese journalist Rachel M'Bon begins her own quest for identity and freedom, questioning her past and her present, holding up a mirror to her peers.

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Télévisions editorial team.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauqué and Damien Thévenot at weekends.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauqué and Damien Thévenot at weekends.

programme.title: La Cuisine D'Isabelle Et Ricardo
programme.desc: Accompanied by Ricardo, Isabelle prepares a lemon and poppy seed meringue pie. She also shows how to blind bake a pastry case using baking beans.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Histoire(S) De Jardins
programme.desc: In Erlenbach, near Zurich, Hanspeter Burkhard and Arnold Wiessmann have succeeded in concentrating an incredible level of diversity in a surprisingly small space. Whilst Arnold supervises the beauty of the garden, Hanspeter constantly brings new species from his travels to complete his collection.

programme.title: Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S - Avant-Matchs
programme.desc: Presenting the next day of the French football championship.

programme.title: Rocky Et Lily : C'Est Dans La Boîte !
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Les Souvenirs De Mamette
programme.desc: Today a friendly 80-year-old grandmother, Mamette was once a headstrong young girl. At the age of nine, she discovered country life with no Internet or mobile phone. A great opportunity for plenty of adventures with her friends, when not taking part in the harvest or rearing goats!

programme.title: Les Comptines De Maryse
programme.desc: When Octave opens the door, Maryse hears the neighbour's lawnmower. The sound makes her sad, why cut the grass? A feeling that acts as a trigger for her nursery rhyme ''The green grass blues''.

programme.title: Les 30 Travaux De Charlie Et Elliot
programme.desc: Alongside the actor Patrice Bélanger, Charlie and Elliot share hints and ideas on how to celebrate a birthday in amongst all the end-of-year seasonal festivities.

programme.title: Les 30 Travaux De Charlie Et Elliot
programme.desc: Charlie and Elliot test their knowledge of Christmas traditions in the company of humorist Christine Morency.

programme.title: Alix Et Les Merveilleux
programme.desc: Alix discovers that the Peepsong fair won't be taking place; Hare has to go to bed early. He has an important concert at dawn the next day and wants to rest.

programme.title: La Cuisine D'Isabelle Et Ricardo
programme.desc: Accompanied by Ricardo, Isabelle prepares a lemon and poppy seed meringue pie. She also shows how to blind bake a pastry case using baking beans.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Mise Au Point
programme.desc: The best reports from ''Mise au Point'', the programme that takes a fresh look at national and international news events. Through its exclusive investigations and in-depth reports, ''Mise au Point'' tackles a wide range of topics: politics, economics, social issues, sports, culture and new trends.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: As the sun rises, Sergeant Alice Bontemps is practicing yoga on the lagoon, when she is suddenly confronted with a particularly macabre scene: the lifeless body of a young jet-setter, murdered after a very exclusive beach party.

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: Jackson asks Alice if she wants to head the investigation, as she was the one to discover the body. But the deeper she delves into this world of image and pretence, the more the truth seems to be masked by appearances.

programme.title: Destination Francophonie
programme.desc: A delicious journey through Taipei's backstreets with a French-trained pastry chef. A visit to a bookshop and unique cultural venue, Le Pigeonnier, rallying point for francophones and francophiles alike. In Keelung, northern Taiwan, a look back at a little-known chapter in Taiwan's history, the French presence during the Sino-French War.

programme.title: #Investigation
programme.desc: Your rendezvous for current affairs and investigative journalism from the RTBF teams. Research, evidence, personal stories and confrontations are at the heart of the film reports about a range of subjects mainly relating to Belgian society. The key words? Independence and transparency!

programme.title: Géopolitis
programme.desc: Geopolitis is a programme which presents what are often complex international situations in a clear, precise and concise manner.

programme.title: Échappées Belles
programme.desc: Welcome to Granville, a peninsula with a population of just over 12,000. Marked by its important tidal range, the years have transformed it from small fishing village to renowned seaside resort. We join Ismaël Khelifa as he recharges the batteries during a weekend spent exploring the town!

programme.title: La Cuisine Des Mousquetaires
programme.desc: On today's menu: pancakes with homemade spread.

programme.title: Le Fils Du Chasseur
programme.desc: Hoping to become closer to a father he hardly knows, Samir joins him on a hunting trip in the mountains. The picturesque Valais scenery forms an idyllic backdrop to this difficult meeting, filmed by Juliette Riccaboni as part of a wider questioning of the concept of ''being a family'' today.
