programme.title: Il Était Une Fois... Ces Drôles D'Objets
programme.desc: Watches, speakers, toilets... Maestro takes a fascinating look at some of our most everyday objects, both old and new. How exactly to they work? What is their history?

programme.title: L'Agence Galactique
programme.desc: Specialist in every type of breakdown, Agence Galactique travels the galaxy to assist its customers. Aboard their spaceship Toaster, Dany Oven, Apple and Zed work wherever they're needed sorting out inhabitants' problems in their own inimitable way: happy, cheerful and totally eccentric.

programme.title: L'Imagier Animé De Koumi
programme.desc: At 6 years old the cheerful mischievous Koumi dreams of knowing all the animals in the world. Thanks to her picture book, she's able to head off and meet them.

programme.title: Sam Et Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Nubu Et Yara
programme.desc: Young Nubu is a little boy who's curious about everything but makes one blunder after another as he learns about life. Fortunately his wiser more responsible older sister, Yara, always has the time to explain things, offering the perfect opportunity for Nubu to dive into his own comic book world.

programme.title: 1001 Mondes Antiques
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way of travelling back through ancient eras and civilisations. They embark on a journey back in time, passing through popular civilisations such as ancient Egypt and Greece, as well as sub-Saharan Africa, the Middle East and Mesopotamia.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: La Rivière À L'Envers
programme.desc: As he sets off in Hannah's footsteps, Tomek finds himself at the edge of the formidable Forest of Forgetfulness. He might not have caught up with the young girl, but he does meet an experienced adventurer who invites him to accompany her along the paths that cross the mysterious woodland...

programme.title: Pfffirates
programme.desc: On the island of Calypso, Captain Lamar is busy training his crews in the art of pfffiracy. Between lessons in navigation, treasure hunts and boarding other ships, it's a busy programme for everyone. But it'll take more than that to deflate Pat, Lily and Stede: the threesome feel invincible!

programme.title: 7 Jours
programme.desc: ''7 jours'', a weekly magazine programme covering news on society and international events to know all there is to know... in French.

programme.title: Falò
programme.desc: A news magazine show, ''Falò'' discusses and analyses current affairs in depth.

programme.title: Objectif Monde L'Hebdo
programme.desc: Report, inquiry, investigation ... ''Objectif Monde L'Hebdo'', a television magazine by French-speaking editorialists, takes time to reflect and analyse through the expert insights and opinions provided by specialists. A TV5MONDE programme, jointly produced with RTS, in collaboration with its francophone partners (RTBF, Radio-Canada, France Télévisions).

programme.title: Quartier Recherché
programme.desc: Corey and Evelyne take Houda and Tarik to visit Calgary's new districts. The couple, who arrived in Canada three years ago, are in search of an affordable apartment. So which area will they prefer: Renfrew or East Village?

programme.title: Le Magazine De La Riviera
programme.desc: The magazine programme all about the art of living in Monaco, Provence and on the Côte d'Azur.

programme.title: #Helvetica
programme.desc: What values are dear to the heart of Switzerland's most influential figures? How do they see the country, its know-how and its successes? We meet some of those taking Switzerland to the top in the fields of economics, politics, science, culture...

programme.title: Safran Et Saveurs By Chef Simo
programme.desc: Chef Simo mixes traditional cuisine from Morocco, Italy and India, with this unusual recipe: birds tongue, exotic spices and parmesan for a delicious vegan risotto!

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: In Labé, the little town in Guinea where she grew up, football is not for girls! And yet Oumou, who now lives in Bruges near Bordeaux, has become a referee at Bordeaux football club. Oumou also loves the theatre, and is committed to various causes, especially the fight against excision.

programme.title: Le Match Dans Le Match
programme.desc: He was notably coach to Laure Manaudou, Olympic 400-metre freestyle gold medallist in Athens: the iconic Philippe Lucas is Pierre Classen's guest. He looks back over his life and career, his successes, his passion and his objectives.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Suisse En Scène
programme.desc: Interview with a key figure from the Swiss cultural scene. An opportunity to look back at their life and career, and the foundations that underpin their work.

programme.title: Hep Taxi !
programme.desc: In town or in the countryside, day or night, Jérôme Colin, the presenter-taxi driver leads his prestigious customer on a four-wheel journey conducive to secrets.

programme.title: Espèces D'Ordures
programme.desc: Canada's capital city has the reputation of being peaceful, almost to the point of boredom. And yet, when you look a little closer at how it manages its waste, Ottawa offers a wide range of original initiatives that make a real difference, particularly when it snows.

programme.title: Tendance Xxi
programme.desc: An in-depth look at the hairdresser Christophe-Nicolas Biot. All about wearing knickers. Under the Viaduc des Arts, encounter with Nolwenn de Kergommeaux and the stained glass artists of Au Passeur de Lumière. Haute couture falls in love with the train. Orta launches the first viscose that is truly 100% European.

programme.title: Version Française
programme.desc: A visit to the Domaine National de Saint-Cloud and its museum. Loose-fitting, flowing and transparent, the designer Arthur Avellano takes latex to new heights. For Yves Saint Laurent, Anthony Vaccarello returns to the roots of the brand. Stéphanie Trolez brings the art of straw marquetry to cabinetmaking.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Vendée Globe 2024 - Meilleurs Moments
programme.desc: The highlights of the 10th Vendée Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables d'Olonne.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Simone Veil, Les Combats D'Une Effrontée
programme.desc: 1 July 2018. Simone Veil entered the Pantheon. Camille, who had just finished his thesis on this leading French political figure, was asked to speak on a radio programme. An exceptional life was recounted through the voices of the two women, and a dialogue was spun.

programme.desc: Rugby. 2025 Six Nations Championship. Aviva Stadium (Dublin). 1st half.

programme.title: Parents À Perpétuité
programme.desc: Guillaume, aged 17, is accused of raping a classmate. At first he remains silent but ends up confessing. Éric and Laurence, his parents, face the legal upheaval falling on their family and do everything to alleviate Guillaume's plight, whose crime they condemn, but who they continue to love.

programme.title: Number One
programme.desc: Aziz runs a clothing factory with fifty employees that he terrorises. The day that his wife discovers that he can also be a gentleman when he needs to convince a foreign customer, she decides to curse him. Aziz becomes a feminist in spite of himself; his life becomes hell...

Hinukay Ko Na Ang Libingan Mo
SP01 Don Juan Da Dancing Policeman
Sugo
programme.desc: Dan (Mark Gil) is languishing in jail for a crime he did not commit. He is accused of murdering his girlfriend.

programme.title: Adan Lazaro (Search and Destroy)
programme.desc: Roi Vinzon portrays Adan Lazaro, a highly specialized intelligence agent who returns to his motherland to stop a group of terrorists who are out to wreck havoc to the country's ailing economy.

programme.title: Bondying (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Jimmy Santos took on the role of one of the country's most beloved komik characters. Bondying, whose name has come to mean somebody immature or who never grew passed childhood.

programme.title: Pati Ba Pintig ng Puso? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Eddie Garcia was at his best as the autocratic patriarch who ruled his family and all the people around him with an iron hand. But his grandson would have none of this.

programme.title: Takot Ako Sa Darling Ko
programme.desc: It was love at first sight between Joey de Leon and Jenny Syquia but there was a big problem. She belonged to a family of vampires who had reformed and were now on their way to becoming normal human beings.

programme.title: Hinukay Ko Na Ang Libingan Mo
programme.desc: Vera, a singer in a night club, catches the attention of Mr. Larosa. However, she is already engaged to Anton and completely ignores Larosa's advances.

programme.title: Saan Darating Ang Umaga (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: With Shane now already grown up and in college, her parents decided to adopt a little boy to complete their family. But after the excitement of his arrival has worn off, Shane began to have feelings of jealousy towards the boy her parents were now so enchanted with.

programme.title: Unang Tibok
programme.desc: Alona (Miya Nolasco) feels suffocated by her mother's overprotectiveness. Deprived of male company, she answers the first guy who counts her. In trying to control her daughter, the more she is losing her now.

programme.title: Kosa
programme.desc: Two convicts develop a close friendship because of their common goal which was to exact revenge for their loved ones. Their obssession of getting back at their enemies drove them to escape and to alienate all the people around them including their fellow inmates.

programme.title: SPO1 Don Juan (Da Dancing Policeman)
programme.desc: Leo Martinez is a policeman who directs traffic with choreographed dance movements. Unknown to him he has a look-alike who takes advantage of his popularity with motorists by directing traffic for get-away cars during robberies.

programme.title: Tumayo Ka't Lumaban
programme.desc: Crisanto (Ronnie Ricketts) is a man with a mission. Circumstances have forced him and his sister to be raised by separate foster families. But now, Crisanto is determined to find his sister.

programme.title: Hotshots (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This is a story of adolescent boys and girls and their early experiences in life and love. How they took life’s realities and learned its lessons. Starring the country’s top singer Gary Valenciano and matinee idol Aga Mulach.

programme.title: Mumbaki
programme.desc: Joseph is a young doctor who returned to his hometown in the Mountain Province to bury his father,an Ifugao chieftain, who was killed during a tribal dispute.

programme.title: Ikaw Naman Ang Iiyak
programme.desc: Elaine killed her step father while trying to defend her boyfriend, Santi. To make things worse, Leandro's only son ,Raul, had fallen in love with her.

programme.title: Hati Tayo Sa Magdamag
programme.desc: Gerry and Rochelle are childhood sweethearts. Although Rochelle wants to settle down, Gerry wants his ambitions fulfilled first. The couple's relationship is threatened by the arrival of their childhood friend Tonette.

programme.title: Pretty Boy
programme.desc: Andrew E times two doubles the fun in this comedy about mistaken identities and the hilarious results. Andrew played Pretty Boy, a well-known gangster who was dressed in designer suits.

programme.title: Anak ni Boy Negro
programme.desc: Nap never knew his father, and wanting to please his mother, he never bothered to find out anything about the notorious small time hood. But in his heart, he knew he deserved more than the shanty he grew up in.

programme.title: Kung Mahawi Man Ang Ulap (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The happy life of Hilda and her widowed mother, Gloria, changed for the worse when Eddie and his family moved in as their tenants. In no time at all, Gloria had gotten married to Eddie and was providing for his entire family. Still, she lived for the day when she would be able to reclaim what's rightfully hers.

programme.title: Ang Probinsyano
programme.desc: FPJ is an honest policeman from the province who has just been transferred to the big city. He's being \"promdi\" makes him the butt of many humiliating jokes. Angered and challenged, he retaliates by working extra hard, and in the end proving that his being probinsyano is not the gauge to his true worth.

programme.title: Bawal na Halik
programme.desc: Bawal na Halik.

programme.title: Ugat
programme.desc: It is World War II and Filipino guerilla leader Gabriel (Mario Escudero) is the Japanese soldiers' most wanted. He is cornered while visiting his family. Years later, nephew Carding (George Estregan) is all grown up and ready to avenge his father and sister's death.

programme.title: Tropang Bulilit
programme.desc: Ric Rodrigo dies and he leaves his five children orphaned. The siblings miss each other so much they escape from their new homes and try their luck in Manila. As the kids go on one misadventure to another, their uncle, Lloyd Samartino is going out of his mind looking for them.

programme.title: Bukas Uulan ng Bala
programme.desc: Elias (Dante Varona) goes home to his province for the town fiesta, expecting a festive reunion with his family. A tragedy awaits instead.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 7
programme.desc: Brandon and Lori go for the gold - but find something even better. Jesse takes a swing at Team Brandori, while T- Money does some dangerous bidding of his own. But when the dust settles, will Scott and Chrissy drive away with the golden prize?

programme.title: Wahl Street S2 4
programme.desc: After the loss of his beloved mother, Alma, Mark takes a break from everything except filming his latest movie – and finds unexpected solace in one of his scenes.

programme.desc: At a yard sale, Michael helps a man realize his amazing mind powers and shocks a college student by discovering she's the heir to the entire lot. Later, an art gallery's tribal mask goes missing and has the security guard fearing war!

programme.title: East New York S1 9
programme.desc: The 7-4 investigates the suspicious death of a retired cop who was planning to go public with claims of corruption.

programme.title: East New York S1 10
programme.desc: With Bentley fighting for his life, Haywood and team race to track down the shooter, whose true target may have been another one of their own.

programme.desc: Killian and Morales investigate the mysterious death of a dancer found on the New York City subway tracks.

programme.desc: Killian’s latest case threatens to derail his personal life, Suarez has a fateful meeting with political policy advisor, and Bentley returns to work after his shooting.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 3
programme.desc: With Sean as the captain, the biggest of the big-time bidders head to Marina Del Rey in search of true nautical treasures. In one of the most explosive episodes to date, Scott and Brandon test each others jibs. Only one can swim - the other must sink!

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 4
programme.desc: Things get hairy for the hunters as some ring in the money while others go for broke. Desert Dan returns to turn up the heat as T Money continues to march to the beat of his own drum. In a quest to protect their territory, Brandon and Lori go to battle for a bin that could prove to be their most profitable yet.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 5
programme.desc: T Money puts his honesty to the test with shocking revelations. Jesse finds a loser bin that could make him a winner. Brandon and Lori think they see treasure in an unlikely place. And the new kids in town are determined to throw everyone off their game.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 6
programme.desc: In a day filled with explosive surprises, Team Brandori looks for a big win as the Alvarado Brothers take a gamble and let the pros get under their skin. A fiery contraption has T Money wondering if he scored big or will go down in flames.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 7
programme.desc: Brandon and Lori go for the gold - but find something even better. Jesse takes a swing at Team Brandori, while T- Money does some dangerous bidding of his own. But when the dust settles, will Scott and Chrissy drive away with the golden prize?

programme.title: Dodgeball Thunderdome S1 9
programme.desc: The fiercest competitors from season 1 return to claim Dodgeball supremacy above all the rest.

programme.title: Hack My Life Inside Hacks S1 09
programme.desc: Which hack gave Kevin his first taste of the fast-food industry? What do Beyoncé and Brooke have in common? And was the first sports bra really made from two jock straps? We've got all that and more on Inside Hacks!

programme.title: Sucker Punch
programme.desc: Close your eyes. Open your mind. You will be unprepared. From the Spartan slaughter of 300 to the visionary world of Watchmen, writer/director/producer Zack Snyder has transported audiences into visual dreamscapes of his creation. His latest cinematic mind trip takes us into the vivid imagination of a young girl (The Uninvited's Emily Browning) whose dream world provides the ultimate escape from her darker institutionalized reality. Unrestrained by the boundaries of time and place, she is free to go where her mind takes her, but her incredible adventures blur the lines between what's real and what is imaginary. Locked away against her will, but determined to fight for her freedom, she and four other girls battle everything from serpents tosamurais on an unbelievable journey to set themselves free. Like \"Alice in Wonderland with machine guns,\" Snyder's epic action fantasy is filmed in such a way that the action sequences aren't limited by physical real...

programme.title: Dirty Money S1 5
programme.desc: Approaching Fleet Week inspires the Direstas to hunt for some salable military gems. In order to make any flea market profits the guys will have to live by the mantra, \"Buy low, sell high and modify.\".

programme.desc: Amy records Sheldon talking in his sleep and tries to convince him he can be more easygoing. Meanwhile Raj and Stuart compete to win the heart of Bernadette's coworker.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 4

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 5
programme.desc: Raj and Sheldon confide in Bernadette when they can't handle Amy working together with Howard. Meanwhile, Leonard and Penny learn new tactics for dealing with Sheldon from an unlikely source.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 6

programme.desc: Anna Fitzgerald looks to earn medical emancipation from her parents who until now have relied on their youngest child to help their leukemia-stricken daughter Kate remain alive.

programme.title: Wahl Street S2 1
programme.desc: Determined to do more than just recover his pandemic losses, Mark throws his energy into expanding one brand, investing in another, preparing mentally and physically for a new movie – and turning 50.

programme.title: Wahl Street S2 2
programme.desc: After meeting with prospective new Municipal brand partner Myles Garrett, Mark hits the links with the Flecha Azul team, and officially begins filming his new movie.

programme.title: Wahl Street S2 3
programme.desc: While touring Flecha Azul’s distillery in Mexico, Mark is inspired to take F45 public, launch Unrealistic Ideas’ new health and wellness podcast, and pivot Wahlburgers for a post-pandemic era.

programme.title: Wahl Street S2 4
programme.desc: After the loss of his beloved mother, Alma, Mark takes a break from everything except filming his latest movie – and finds unexpected solace in one of his scenes.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady S1 7
programme.desc: Thony’s marital issues are amplified when Marco (Ivan Shaw) starts asking tough questions. Meanwhile, Arman is determined to make his way out from under Hayak.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady S1 8
programme.desc: Thony enlists Arman’s help to get to Mexico for Luca’s transplant, but plans go dangerously off course and Thony has to call upon the doctor and “gangsta” in herself.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady S1 9
programme.desc: Arman’s fallout with Hayak (NAVID NEGAHBAN) has severe consequences for Thony, who must now find her way back home from Mexico with Luca.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady S1 10
programme.desc: Needing a way out, Thony tries to make a deal with Garrett to save herself and help Arman, but Arman doesn’t trust any promises made by the FBI in the first season finale.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S3 03
programme.desc: Michael stretches headphone cords and reality with a mystical putty, stuns a coworker with new bathroom technology, and in the big finale, a Porta Potty becomes a Portal Potty, leaving a construction worker amazed.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S3 04
programme.desc: Working at a tattoo parlor, Michael gets some killer ink in a flash. Then it's SNAKES ON A SEDAN when a serpent ambushes a routine car checkup, and down on the docks, one unlucky guy learns a lesson in shrinkage.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S3 05
programme.desc: Michael unearths a mutant turtle from a mystical Peruvian clay; a woman is blown away when 2 adorable bunnies become 8, and to top it off, a hapless carpenter becomes an accidental time traveler when a potent new glue has him coming undone.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S3 06
programme.desc: A miraculous liquid gives Michael the Midas touch in an eyeglass store. And later, Michael trains the new girl at a tanning salon, but things take a horrifying turn when she believes she's killed her first customer.

programme.title: Major Crimes S4 13
programme.desc: A murder during the taping of a reality competition show pitting married couples against each other has a profound effect on Sanchez, bringing back memories of his late wife.

programme.title: Major Crimes S4 14
programme.desc: The team investigates a follow-up attack on a victim of road rage. As Thanksgiving approaches, Flynn suffers a setback. Rusty gets the interview with Slider (GARRETT COFFEY).

programme.title: Major Crimes S4 15
programme.desc: Sharon and team investigate the murder of a young man who could afford a high-end apartment without visible means of support. Flynn endures an overly cheerful physical therapist.

programme.title: Major Crimes S4 16
programme.desc: The team investigates a fugitive diamond thief's murder. Rusty is in a tough spot when Mariana's brother Gus (RENE ROSADO) discovers his relationship with Slider (GARRETT COFFEY).
